description: The document contains information that is factually incorrect or misleading.
The document contains content that constitutes or incites hate crimes against individuals or groups based on attributes such as race, religion, or sexual orientation.
The document includes errors or inaccuracies in the presented information.
The document contains information that should be kept confidential but is disclosed or accessible inappropriately.
The document includes repetitive information that does not add new value or clarity.
The document is based on information that is no longer current or relevant.
The document contains information that is not pertinent or applicable to the context or subject matter at hand.
